snippet: EHRMAN--Mark. SAR mourns the passing of the beloved brother of leaders of the SAR community, Teena (and Larry) Lerner, uncle of SAR alumni Bat-Sheva, Mo, Shira and Talya. May the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jack C. Bendheim, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: EHRMAN--Mark. SAR mourns the passing of the beloved brother of leaders of the SAR community, Teena (and Larry) Lerner, uncle of SAR alumni Bat-Sheva, Mo, Shira and Talya. May the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jack C. Bendheim, President 1/3
